(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (DT This))
    (VP (VBD was)
      (ADJP (JJ such)
        (SBAR
          (S
            (NP (DT an) (JJ unexpected))
            (VP (VBP find))))))
    (. .)))


nsubj(such-3, This-1)
cop(such-3, was-2)
root(ROOT-0, such-3)
det(unexpected-5, an-4)
nsubj(find-6, unexpected-5)
ccomp(such-3, find-6)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP I))
    (VP (MD could)
      (VP (VB tell)
        (NP (PRP you))
        (PP (IN about)
          (SBAR
            (WHADVP (WRB how))
            (S
              (NP (DT the) (NN stall))
              (VP (VBZ is)
                (ADJP
                  (NP (CD three) (NNS generations))
                  (JJ old))))))))
    (, ,)))


nsubj(tell-3, I-1)
aux(tell-3, could-2)
root(ROOT-0, tell-3)
dobj(tell-3, you-4)
prep(tell-3, about-5)
advmod(old-12, how-6)
det(stall-8, the-7)
nsubj(old-12, stall-8)
cop(old-12, is-9)
num(generations-11, three-10)
npadvmod(old-12, generations-11)
pcomp(about-5, old-12)


(ROOT
  (S
    (VP (VBN founded)
      (PP (IN by)
        (NP
          (NP (DT the) (NN grandpa))
          (PP (IN in)
            (NP (CD 1966))))))
    (. .)))


root(ROOT-0, founded-1)
prep(founded-1, by-2)
det(grandpa-4, the-3)
pobj(by-2, grandpa-4)
prep(grandpa-4, in-5)
pobj(in-5, 1966-6)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP I))
    (VP (MD could)
      (VP (VB tell)
        (NP (PRP you))
        (PP (IN about)
          (SBAR
            (WHADVP (WRB how))
            (S
              (NP (PRP they))
              (VP (VB remove)
                (NP
                  (NP (DT the) (NN skin))
                  (PP (IN from)
                    (NP (DT the) (NN soy) (NNS beans))))
                (S
                  (VP (TO to)
                    (VP (VB make)
                      (ADJP (JJ sure)
                        (SBAR
                          (S
                            (NP (PRP you))
                            (VP (VBP do) (RB n't)
                              (VP (VB get)
                                (NP (DT that) (JJ waxy) (NN taste))
                                (PP (IN in)
                                  (NP (PRP$ your) (NN mouth)))))))))))))))))
    (. .)))


nsubj(tell-3, I-1)
aux(tell-3, could-2)
root(ROOT-0, tell-3)
dobj(tell-3, you-4)
prep(tell-3, about-5)
advmod(remove-8, how-6)
nsubj(remove-8, they-7)
pcomp(about-5, remove-8)
det(skin-10, the-9)
dobj(remove-8, skin-10)
prep(skin-10, from-11)
det(beans-14, the-12)
nn(beans-14, soy-13)
pobj(from-11, beans-14)
aux(make-16, to-15)
xcomp(remove-8, make-16)
acomp(make-16, sure-17)
nsubj(get-21, you-18)
aux(get-21, do-19)
neg(get-21, n't-20)
ccomp(sure-17, get-21)
det(taste-24, that-22)
amod(taste-24, waxy-23)
dobj(get-21, taste-24)
prep(get-21, in-25)
poss(mouth-27, your-26)
pobj(in-25, mouth-27)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP I))
    (VP (MD could)
      (VP (VB tell)
        (NP (PRP you))
        (PP (IN about)
          (SBAR
            (WHADVP (WRB how))
            (S
              (NP (PRP they))
              (VP (VBP use)
                (NP (CD four) (NNS ingredients))
                (S
                  (VP (TO to)
                    (VP (VB make)
                      (NP (DT the) (NN sugar) (NN syrup)))))))))))
    (. .)))


nsubj(tell-3, I-1)
aux(tell-3, could-2)
root(ROOT-0, tell-3)
dobj(tell-3, you-4)
prep(tell-3, about-5)
advmod(use-8, how-6)
nsubj(use-8, they-7)
pcomp(about-5, use-8)
num(ingredients-10, four-9)
dobj(use-8, ingredients-10)
aux(make-12, to-11)
xcomp(use-8, make-12)
det(syrup-15, the-13)
nn(syrup-15, sugar-14)
dobj(make-12, syrup-15)
